website_summaries.verdict: If your kids love the color pink and other pastels, this TINKERTOY set was made with them in mind.
pros: Offers 150 different pieces, including rods, flags, and spools - a great set for building a variety of models or for creative free play
Ships with instructions to build 15 different models, such as a castle or a few animals
cons: Pastel-colored pieces will disappoint some vintage TINKERTOY fans

customer_reviews.title: We love Tinker Toys and are thankful for a girl version
customer_reviews.text: We love Tinker Toys! My daughter was excited to get her own set like her big brother! I'm glad we haven't completely done away with gendered toys! I love pink and purple Legos and other building toys or tools. This set on its own limits your ability to build, but we have 2 others and now have enough to build some really fun things!
customer_reviews.author: ajac0586

customer_reviews.title: No Container
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Fast shipping but I was expecting a box to store them. Was disappointed with a bunch of tinker toys in plastic bags. My son's tinkertoys used to come with a barrel to store them. Of course I bought these for my granddaughters so I guess a lot has changed since they were made from wood and had a storage container.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Schlienger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, great seller!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, my daughter loved it! Fast shipping and great price too!
customer_reviews.author: lovecraft-blackwood

customer_reviews.title: so this set is perfect! I can't wait to see her playing with ...
customer_reviews.text: My grand-daughter loves to build and loves pink, so this set is perfect! I can't wait to see her playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: KERRY B.

customer_reviews.title: Girls can built too!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my granddaughters for Christmas. Hopefully they will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele D. Kane

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.text: Great toy but missing half of the stuff that was supposed to be included. Not happy about it. None of the eyes, girl or horse came with along with the pink leaf looking things. It's like two bags we're missing when I got it. I got it for my four year old an she is bummed there was no horse.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Novell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love they have pink tinker toys! My daughter loves tinker toys and finally has some pink and purple ones
customer_reviews.author: Sandra H.

customer_reviews.title: A trusted standby
customer_reviews.text: Always a favorite for boys and girls; this pink set is a hit with my 5 year old granddaughter
customer_reviews.author: Ben G Raimer

customer_reviews.title: Good assortment and fit together well
customer_reviews.text: Whole family loves these. Good assortment and fit together well. 5 yr old granddaughter loves them as does her 4 yr old cousin.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Wade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my 4 year old granddaughter. She likes this!
customer_reviews.author: L. Basford

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt recommend
customer_reviews.text: Better buy 2. There is a odd number of many pieces which you can't complete most of the projects
customer_reviews.author: Robert Diggs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great gift for my 4yr old granddaughter who loves pink
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My girls love these! They are great for the imagination
customer_reviews.text: My girls love these! They are great for the imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda N Bays

customer_reviews.title: It seems is a nice toy with great concept
customer_reviews.text: It seems is a nice toy with great concept. However it isn't so attractive to my 3-years old girl. She rarely plays it.
customer_reviews.author: Yin Chen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A gift for a friend's little girl, she enjoys it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren really like the tinker-toys-ages 3 and 4. Brought back memories for me
customer_reviews.author: Judith Rodemich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the building guide that comes with this and seeing my kids get creative and make their own!
customer_reviews.author: Sindy Young

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Colors are great! My daughter loves that they're made for girls. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: My son and daughter both love Tinker Toys! And they don't care about the 'girly' colors either, so it's great! All these pieces add to our growing collection well!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: One of the eyeball pieces was missing from the set.
customer_reviews.author: John K. Books

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is our second pink tinkertoy set. both are great
customer_reviews.author: marianne krantz

customer_reviews.title: Great for snow days
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a christmas gift for my 4 year old and she loves it! Her big sister loves it too! They build things together and play with it for a long time. Great for snow days!
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping they would be more like the original.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter loves this and great price.. She is 4 and plays for long periods of time with this.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: They love it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my granddaughters. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Harbodin

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat creative toys like these!
customer_reviews.text: All three kiddos (even down to the 1 1/2 year old) love playing with these, and to my surprise, they have been able to make tons of cool things using these toys. They are definitely worth the money. In fact, I have purchased more to give as gifts to some of my nieces.
customer_reviews.author: lilly's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Miss the old school wood ones
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is I thought they were still made out of wood like the old school tinker toys, but they still work and fit the same plus my granddaughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: not easy for toddler to play with (insert pieces into holes) ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery as promised. Tinkertoy pieces are made out of plastic, not easy for toddler to play with (insert pieces into holes) vs older versions that were made out of wood pieces. Diminished value..Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna M.

customer_reviews.title: Fun pink color for girls
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 4 year old granddaughter. She loves that it is pink and loves building things. It keeps her out of her two brothers' legos!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for our daughter who loves to build. She uses it with her "original" Tinker Toy set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These have been a hit with my 4 and 6 year-old-girls!
customer_reviews.author: Tara  Lebow Merrell

customer_reviews.title: Lots of missing pieces....
customer_reviews.text: Our box was missing all the eyes and critter pieces. It only had the basic building pieces in it. Very frustrating for my daughter to open it this morning on Christmas and have it missing the fun pieces.
customer_reviews.author: ASG

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old daughter who loves to play with blocks. They were a hit, she has played with them everyday since she got them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TINKERTOY – Pink Building Set – 150 Pieces – Ages 3+ – Preschool Educational Toy
product_meta.description:
The TINKERTOY Pink set includes 150 durable, plastic pieces including spools, straight rods, bendable rods, wheels, eyes, two buildable figures and more! Durable Product.

BRAND STORY
By K'Nex
feature_bullets: Young builders can create a castle, flower, cat and more!|150 durable, lightweight plastic pieces|^Rods, spools and flag pieces are made in the USA|Colorful pieces snap together and stay together for long-lasting play|^15 Easy-to-assemble ideas for all skill levels|Comes in a durable box with lid for easy storage and portability|Ages 3+|. Durable Product

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars57 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
